TopicTitle: How many hours have YOU played?

Articles.Content:
So I was looking at the number of hours I've played KSP on Steam and I've gotten it up to 40. Now I was fairly late to the Steam party and I know this number will be very VERY low compared to a lot of you more avid players out there so I was wondering, how many hours have you played KSP?

For those that don't have the Steam version, maybe take a guess?
200 hours on the nose yay steam! been a kerbonaut myself since like 2 days after .21 came out lol

I wish I could have logged how many hours I originally played, before the days of Steam. I've been playing since 0.16 and I used to play a LOT! As in, entire weekends would disappear in the flash of an exploding rocket. I just don't have the time anymore
425hrs on Steam, probably double that before it was released on Steam.
God only knows how many hours I've played. Might be even a month (actually, I'm not 100% sure here). Definitely more than two weeks though.

Been playing since 0.17, on a daily basis.

God, has this game changed.

391 hours according to steam. Maybe an hour on the demo before that.

Less than I expected, really.

230 hours here, and I still haven't reached Jool yet .

Started at .20, and a few weeks later .21 came out. Before that, played the demo to death.
There are definitely some impressive numbers here, I wonder how many hours in total KSP has been played by its fan base, that'd be an interesting figure to compare to other games.
95 according to steam, but I've played probably at least 200 hours before I made the transfer.
Steam says 472 hours, and I haven't really left Kerbin's SOI so far.
Playing since 0.16, spent about 300 hours playing it. Yesterday, i spent 19 hours of the day playing KSP (nothing to do)

88 hours on Steam, maybe 40-50 off-Steam.

That's a lot for me, considering my most played game is only 124 hours...which actually means that KSP is probably my most played Steam game

That's good to know

Hoping to push it above 100 Steam hours by the end of Christmas
580 and counting
phew, i thought mine were stupidly high until i saw this thread. I am on 326 hrs played.
I've played since 0.9 or so and I estimate 1500-2000 hours.
Since I often experiment with mods on stand alone copies from Steam, I haven't the foggiest idea.
I've been playing on-off since v0.8, but I've had entire weekends whiz by while playing . . . if I had to guess, probably 1000 hours or so
For me it is 159 hours as of yesterday
I've been playing since around 0.13 and never switched to Steam, so I don't have any actual data to back this up, but.. at LEAST in the neighborhood of 1000 hours.
I guess more than 800 hours I believe and I think about starting to stream on twitch.
317 hours on my Steam. I've only played the game on Steam.

322hrs on Steam. Got the game right after .22 arrived.

Maybe 75hrs off-steam in various modded clones.

I play far too much in retrospect, it felt fine at the time, but a little quick math shows it to be something like 17 days over just 2 months, averaging out around 6hrs/day

I've got some way to go to top my steam rankings though. I have 1.7 thousand hours (70 days) in X3. ( yah, meganerd who loves spacegames )

Edited December 27, 2013 by celem

984 hours as of this morning on Steam.

Now granted, I've probably blown a 100 hours or so afk while I let a mapsat or Kethane mod do a full planetary scan in from a polar orbit. Generally I get an 1-2 hours most nights during the week and maybe 4-6 hours for the weekend.

I've got some way to go to top my steam rankings though. I have 1.7 thousand hours (70 days) in X3. ( yah, meganerd who loves spacegames )

2300 hours on Civ5...

Don't know for KSP. Will check next time i can play (sunday evening)...
